title: T4RA
author: T4RA
content: Sorry, but I am definitely considerable noob of the year when it comes to Bitcoin and honestly even tho i heard of it in 2012 my friend Xander was a big supporter of the getting rid of centralized gov-owned banks. We were also hoping Ron Paul would legalize all drugs and proztitutes. LMAONE WAY - i inherited a Physical bitcoin that supposedly is worth 3k - 12k but i dont know personally the exact worth. DM me and i can shoot u the image!Much love & also scope my320 + songs i have out on all platforms hyperfollow.com/nicktara

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: You can post a photo here using https://www.talkimg.com/Or/and post what kind of physical coin you own with more details.Be careful, the private key must not be visible (even partially) otherwise your funds will be compromised.Beware of PMs, you risk to attract many scammers. The combo “noob of the year” + BTC = scammers magnet Reported to a mod, maybe he will move your topic in Collectibles section, where you will have more potential answers
